name: Lemon Pepper Wings
description: A delicious appetizer for those who prefer non-saucy wings!
preparation: Toss wings with seasoning. Place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Bake for 25–30 min, or until cooked through.
tips: For crunchier wings, place Cooling Racks on Sheet Pan, lightly brush with oil to prevent sticking, then place chicken on top; bake. No Cooling Racks? No problem! Toss uncooked wings with seasoning and enough corn starch to lightly coat them; bake on lined Sheet Pan.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
